May I speak to Amanda, please?
I'll be your teacher from today.
Sorry, what is your name again?
Amanda, it's our first lesson, so can you tell me about yourself?
My name is Amanda and I'm 29 years old.
Yes, my hobby is reading books.
Can you recommend me a good book?
I wanted to read it, too.
I go to the movies every weekend.
